title: If you play support and don't have a sightstone on first b

replies.body: Takes time to build knowledge. When it comes down to it: we're all dumbshits man. Just turn into polished shit really as we get better

yes as you cant get a upgraded trinket at lv 9 nar only sup should ward as 3 wards are enof to cover the map get real  not to mention iv seen this so many times wen the adc complains about how the sup dose not have a sightstone but the same player will get ganked with wards out as they don't look at the map
